name: Kingdom Hunt
description:
Kingdom Hunt is a single player "Duck Hunt" style shooter created within the Old System Jam 2 by myself and my friend Gears. The theme was "You are the Enemy" which inspired us to make an anti-platformer, where the typical hero is the one you must stop from winning, by shooting power-ups and making him fail. 

The system we based our game around was the original Gameboy.

Please rate our game and let us know what you think in the comments id love some feedback, thanks!
